Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/gameCenterLeaderboardLocalizations/{id}/relationships/gameCenterLeaderboardImage

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-gamecenterleaderboardlocalizations-_id_-relationships-gamecenterleaderboardimage#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/gameCenterLeaderboardLocalizations/{id}/relationships/gameCenterLeaderboardImage
```
